content.text:
The Wedding Collection, by Interhome

Interhome has launched its first ever product tailored to wedding and honeymoon specialists, creating ‘The Wedding Collection, by Interhome’, a curated portfolio of holiday homes across 17 countries.

The self-catering properties range from luxury farmhouses, to villas with private pools and budget apartments accommodating up to 18 guests; making them ideal for wedding groups. The majority of the properties are located close to well-known destination wedding venues, whilst some can even host the wedding at the property itself. ‘The Wedding Collection, by Interhome’ was introduced by Interhome's Business Development Manager, Danny Waine; formerly co-founder of overseas wedding specialist, Perfect Weddings Abroad.

Worldwide Destination Wedding Locations

Interhome, part of the Hotelplan Group, feature a number of properties where couples can get married on-site, including the Thalassines Beach Villas in Cyprus (pictured), Taymouth Marina in Scotland, Castello Monticelli in Italy and the Knightsbrook Estate in Ireland.

Short-haul properties situated close to wedding venues, include the luxury 6 Bedroom Holiday Home Lucija, which overlooks popular Dubrovnik wedding location, Lokrum Island. Blue Breeze, a 2 Bedroom budget villa in the resort of Laganas, Zante near to Vezalis Beach and Cameo Island. Long-haul properties featured, include the 4 Bedroom Kaapkloof Manor in South Africa, with beach wedding location Camps Bay close-by and in the US with New York Manhattan Residences’ 1 and 2 Bedroom apartments, close to Central Park’s many outdoor wedding ceremony venues.

There are also winter wedding options for those seeking a snow ceremony, including the Solaria Apartments in Davos, Switzerland; just a short distance to the The Chapel at Hard Rock Davos and the 7 Bedroom Holiday Home Hiihtogreeni in Finnish Lapland, for couples looking to experience the Northern Lights and honeymoon in nearby glass igloos.

Danny Waine said, "The idea behind ‘The Wedding Collection, by Interhome’ is to make it easier for agents to sell weddings abroad, by signposting them to properties that are ideal for multi-generational wedding groups and close to some of the most popular ceremony locations for British couples marrying overseas".

Around half of the countries featured in the portfolio, permit legal weddings for British couples and the rest can host non-legal commitment ceremonies. Waine commented "One of the biggest changes in the weddings abroad market in recent years has been driven by social media and specifically the influence of Instagram. When the overseas wedding market was in its infancy, couples would only travel to destinations where they could legally get married; nowadays couples are more concerned about capturing the perfect wedding photo with a stunning backdrop; whilst being happy to take care of the legal paperwork back in the UK. This is reflected in the diverse range of product that we’re offering across the 17 countries that we’re featuring in The Wedding Collection"

Are you curious about the suggested wedding venues? Visit the Portifolio of Properties in the Wedding Collection, by Interhome. 

All properties are bookable by travel agencies and tour operators via the Interhome UK Partner Portal via GDS reservation systems, as well as by telephone on +44 1483 863509. All bookings made from The Wedding Collection, by Interhome are fully commissionable to the UK travel trade.
